title: Calories in 93% Lean Ground Beef
meta_description: Discover calories in 93 lean ground beef per 100 g, including protein, fat, carbs, and nutrition facts for this low-fat option.
assumptions: Raw, 93% lean / 7% fat ground beef; no added seasonings or fillers; values based on USDA data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content exactness, grinding method, and cooking; raw vs. cooked alters values. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of 93% lean ground beef contains about 152 kcal and 21 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp oil for cooking per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g of 93% lean ground beef?
What is the protein content in 93 lean ground beef?
faqs.a: About 21 g protein per 100 g raw.

faqs.q: Does cooking change calories in 93% lean ground beef?
faqs.a: Yes, cooking and draining fat reduces calories to ~132 kcal per 100 g.

faqs.q: How much fat is in 93 lean ground beef?
faqs.a: 7 g total fat per 100 g, with 3 g saturated.
Yes, 0 g carbs and 0 g fiber per 100 g.
